name: ts-graph-mcp
description: MCP server that extracts TypeScript code structure into a graph database, enabling advanced exploration for AI coding agents

scripts.check: npm run test && npm run build && npm run lint:fix
scripts.benchmark:deep-chain: npm run build && npx tsx benchmark/lib/setup.ts sample-projects/deep-chain && npx tsx benchmark/lib/run.ts sample-projects/deep-chain
scripts.benchmark:layered-api: npm run build && npx tsx benchmark/lib/setup.ts sample-projects/layered-api && npx tsx benchmark/lib/run.ts sample-projects/layered-api
scripts.benchmark:monorepo: npm run build && npx tsx benchmark/lib/setup.ts sample-projects/monorepo && npx tsx benchmark/lib/run.ts sample-projects/monorepo
scripts.benchmark:all: npm run benchmark:deep-chain && npm run benchmark:layered-api && npm run benchmark:monorepo
